news.title: Version 0.8 Available
news.text: This version brings a lot of updates to editor functionality as well as making the entire app much more responsive.

news.title: Weapon systems activate!
news.text: All of the simple and martial 1-handed weapons are now available in the database for Pathfinder (v1)

news.title: Online Database active
news.text: The Squire database of game rules and character files is now online and will dynamically update to provide access to the latest spells, classes, feats, and items for Pathfinder (v1)
